text: @JJohnymac @NewType36999768 @davidkurten It's not being rolled out all of a sudden I was one of the engineers on the 1st 5g test site 2+ years ago it's been planned since before that and all infrastructure is classed as key work bud for example I'm not installing much at minute I'm mainly working on faults
